messages.title: Good Morning
messages.content: Vote for a brighter future today with the Liberal Democrats.

messages.title: 3 reasons to back Layla today
messages.content: Layla Moran opposes the Dementia Tax. Layla backs £6 billion extra for our NHS through a 1p raise in Income Tax. Layla opposes these hard developments that steal our green spaces.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes the Dementia Tax; supports £6 billion extra for our NHS through a 1p raise in Income Tax.
Opposes hard developments that steal our green spaces.

mentions.tacticalSituation: YouGov says it's neck and neck here with Lib Dem 47% and Con 41%, Lab can't win here.

issues.health: Supports £6 billion extra for our NHS through a 1p raise in Income Tax.

housing.content: Opposes hard developments that steal our green spaces.

images.caption: Good Morning - Vote for a brighter future today with the Liberal Democrats - Layla to WIN
